LanguageData.HamsterWheelGenerator.label: hamster wheel generator
LanguageData.HamsterWheelGenerator.description: Produces electricity from a hamster wheel. The amount of power generated is proportional to the running speed.

LanguageData.HamsterWheelGenerator_Frame.label: hamster wheel generator (building)
LanguageData.HamsterWheelGenerator_Frame.description: Produces electricity from a hamster wheel. The amount of power generated is proportional to the running speed.
